name: Christmas Luge
shortDesc: The penguins in the villages below need some Christmas cheer! Slide your way down the snowy mountains, gathering scarves along the way, and toss them to penguins in need.
desc:
The penguins in the villages below need some Christmas cheer! Slide your way down the snowy mountains, gathering scarves along the way, and toss them to penguins in need.

Features
  • Slide down the luge, hitting the ramps and corkscrews on the way
  • Throw scarves at cold penguins
  • Charming Christmas atmosphere

name: Dungeons and Raids
shortDesc: Dungeons and Raids is a gacha game where you will collect heroes and make them fight in the dungeons...
desc:
Dungeons and Raids



Dungeons and Raids is a gacha game where you will collect heroes and make them fight in the dungeons...



In Dungeons and Raids you will be a summoner whom summons champions to fight for you in the dungeons.
fighting dungeon enemies will reward you loot wich can be traded at the Market. or used in Crafting.
You will be able to merge your champions and combine theyr skills...when attempting to build a unique team
that could progress even further in the dungeons.




  • Several unique champions to collect.
  • Merge the champions and combine theyr skills.
  • Experience different combos and team compositions.
  • Unique Items to be crafted and bought at the Market..
  • Move to more difficult levels...
  • No Microtransactions
  • (Game still being worked so more will come)

name: Poly Puzzle: Animals
shortDesc: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with animals.
desc:
Poly Puzzle: Animals— cute, relaxing puzzle game. The player's goal - puzzle pieces together to get a beautiful picture.

In Poly Puzzle: Animals:

- 50 levels
- Polygonal art
- Achievements
- Relax music

name: Mouse Dreams
shortDesc: This fun puzzle platformer may seem simple - get the cheese then escape to the exit - but the challenge grows with each level, and even seasoned puzzle gamers will be stumped by the tricky puzzles in Mouse Dreams.
desc:
Get the cheese, then get to the exit. It's that easy! Or is it?

Mouse Dreams is a puzzle platformer with bright, colourful graphics, where you must solve puzzles by pushing boxes, manipulating light, strategically powering objects like moving platforms and doors.

In this single-screen puzzle platformer, you must navigate increasingly challenging levels with simple platforming and whimsical puzzles. Defy gravity, avoid the ghosts, use moving platforms, and more!



Mouse Dreams has been carefully designed to give you a fun, smooth learning curve from the easy early puzzles through to the challenging late-game puzzles. You can always try a different puzzle if you get stuck, then go back and finish those you had trouble with later.

name: Chess & Guns
shortDesc: Chess & Guns is a mix between chess and real-time third person combat. Use your piece's weapon, ability and the environment to your advantage to be the last one on the board.
desc:
Take Control Of Your Army
Use strategy to gain an advantage on the board and face your opponent on the battlefield with your piece's unique weapon and ability. Only the winner will return to the board.

Chess & Guns is a mix between chess and real-time third person combat. being the first one to attack will allow you to see your opponent through walls. But only by effectively using your piece's weapon, ability and the environment to your advantage can you be sure to come out on top.

Features:
  • 2-8 Player multiplayer
  • 6 Weapons
  • 6 Abilities
  • Different maps to play
  • 2 Teams
  • Highly detailed environments
  • Different interactable objects in each map
  • Custom server settings (balancing, time limit, etc...)
  • Great soundtrack

More maps will be added

Chess & Guns uses player hosted servers.

name: Forgotten Mines
shortDesc: Take control of a team of dwarves fighting to reclaim their people's forgotten mines. In this turn-based tactical RPG, every room within the mountain is a new procedurally generated challenge.
desc:
Imagine if Kentarou Miura's Berserk met Into the Breach and Lord of The Rings in a game. So, this is Forgotten Mines. A fantastical turn-based roguelike RPG with tons of content and replayability, about a party of dwarves who wants to claim back their old mines of Dorvgrad.

- PROCEDURALLY GENERATED CONTENT -


The rooms, equipments, enemies and even the dwarves in your party are procedurally generated by the game. Every run is a new experience and a new chance to make a more powerful build.

- CHARACTER CLASSES -


There are a lot of character classes in Forgotten Mines such as Knight, Cleric, Berserker, Hunter, Paladin, Assassin, Druid, Red Mage, Black Mage, Monk and much more.

- EQUIPMENTS -


Almost 200 different equipments exist on Dorvgrad abandoned mines to be found and used by the dwarf heroes.

- TIPS AND HINTS -


This is a brutal roguelike: you has to expect to die a lot at beginning. When playing, try to farm the gems (the little diamonds) and spend then on the MetaShop menu, after clicking on the "Upgrades" button on the Title Screen. Good luck exploring the Dorvgrad's Forgotten Mines.

name: Chester: Into The Light
shortDesc: Your once favorite plush toy now torments your mind. Find your way out of the nightmares each night, and bring your fears into the light.
desc:
Your once favorite plush toy has become the thing of nightmares. He now stalks your dreams, and is hunting you with a ravenous hatred.




Every nightmare has a way out. You need to find it, and live long enough to pass through it. Chester will not like this. He feeds on your fear, and needs it to survive.




Always be on the lookout for places to hide... and to run to. Swift thinking and awareness will be your most valuable assets as you try to evade Chester and make it through the night.




Chester resides in the darkness, and hates the light. Each night, remember to embrace it. Never forget, darkness must always flee the light...

Gameplay Info:


Chester: Into The Light is a a full length story driven horror game about fear, and prison of the mind many of us struggle to escape from. Step into the shoes of James, a young child who's tormented by a horrific monster. James' severe fear of his once favorite plush toy named "Chester" has bled into his dreams, and is rapidly feeding off of his misery. Endure through the terror and uncover the truth about Chester, and what really lies within.

EPILEPSY WARNING: Chester: Into The Light features flashing screens, bright lights, and disorienting visual effects. Please consult your doctor before playing if you have a history of epilepsy.

name: Roll Ball
shortDesc: 'Roll Ball' is a casual game. The operation of the game is simple, suitable for playing for a while in leisure time.
desc:
'Roll Ball' is a casual game. The operation of the game is simple, suitable for playing for a while in leisure time.
In the game, the ball will keep moving forward, and obstacles will appear in front of it. The ball must avoid these obstacles to get points.
[Game Operation]
Long press the left mouse button to move, used to control the ball movement.

[Game Mode]
The game has 2 modes, endless mode and level mode.
[Game features]
The game will end when the ball encounters an obstacle, and the game will become more and more difficult over time.
Ruby can be obtained in the game. Ruby can buy balls of different styles and scenes of different styles in the store.
If the level mode is used, the game will become more and more difficult with the increase of the number of levels. It requires certain skills to pass the level.

name: Photographer Simulation: 摄影大师兄
shortDesc: Girl Photography Simulator
desc:
"Photographer Simulation" can shoot a lot of very beautiful portrait works through lighting arrangement and adjustment, application of lens angle and special effects.
In the process of use, it will effectively improve the application of the light lens and its understanding of portrait photography, and it will be greatly helpful in the future practical process.

1. Provide two virtual model, Ke Wen and Mixi, provide a lot of actions and expressions for shooting
2. Provide three kinds of lights: point light, spot light, parallel light
3. Provide a variety of lens special effects, including lens soft light, depth of field, color tone, etc...
4. Provide a variety of background plates for shooting
5. Provide general definition and high-definition filming
6. Shooting scenes that can save and read layouts

Try to be a photograpther！

name: Dead of The Sea
shortDesc: Dead of the sea is a pirate-themed VR multiplayer survival shooter where you can join your fellow pirates to end the curse of the Island of Lost Souls. Survive waves of the island's deadly inhabitants while collecting magical power by defeating enemies.
desc: Dead of the sea is a pirate-themed VR multiplayer survival shooter where you can join your fellow pirates to end the curse of the Island of Lost Souls. Survive waves of the island's deadly inhabitants while collecting magical power by defeating enemies. Unlock new abilities, upgrade your weapons, and discover the secrets of the strange island. From the chaotic waves of Shipwreck Beach, haunting ghost town of The Village, the island's deep and dangerous Jungle tundras, damp and claustrophobic Caves and Coves to the Witch Kings ancient Temple of Dark Magic, the Island of Lost Souls is named as such for a reason: the many adventurers and privateers who do not return!

name: Aeolus Fighter
shortDesc: "Aeolus Fighter" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.
desc:
[Game Introduction]
"Aeolus Fighter" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.

[Game Control]
Players can control the game through keyboard, keyboard+mouse or joystick.

[Game Features]
Players can get diamonds by destroying enemy planes, and diamonds can be used to upgrade the protagonist's fighter planes in the supply station. The types that can be upgraded include the number of bullets, the power of bullets, lasers, protective shields, large-scale attack weapons and so on.
Players can gain experience when they hit enemy planes. After the experience is full, the main gun and secondary gun of the fighter will be upgraded. After the level reaches the maximum, the protagonist fighter will enter the state of blood.

name: IN THE BUILDING: CATS 2
shortDesc: Is a game where you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all apartments of a multi-storey building. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet.... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.
desc:
IN THE BUILDING: CATS 2

is a game where you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all apartments of a multi-storey building. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet.... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.

In the second part of the game, you have to search not only the large hall and bathroom, but also the bedroom.

Key features:
  • 5 floors;
  • 265 cats;
  • Bonus level - roof;
  • Hints;

During the development of this game, we were motivated by the game "A Building Full of Cats".

name: Jump Jump
shortDesc: 'Jump Jump' is a casual game. Play by jumping with the help of the operator.
desc:
'Jump Jump' is a casual game. Play by jumping with the help of the operator. Jumping onto the box counts as 1 point, and jumping into the middle of the box counts as 2 points.
[Game Operation]
Click the mouse on the screen to start accumulating force. Release the mouse and the villain will jump.
[Game features]
The distance of the villain's jump will be determined according to the length of the force accumulation time. The longer the force accumulation time is, the farther he will jump. It takes skill to get high marks.
The game is easy and fast, which is suitable for playing in leisure time.

name: Transparent
shortDesc: Transparent is a puzzle plateform game where you have to help a little ghost living an extraordinary adventure in a game mixing platforms and puzzles. But be careful because all power comes with a side effect. each time you use a power, you consume your own energy, until you disappear.
desc:
Once upon a time, a small creature opened its eyes in an unknown world.
This little ghost, this frightened little ghost, began to explore this strange world in order to solve its mysteries and learn more about his own existence.

Help Transparent in his extraordinary adventure in this hand drawn 2D game mixing platforms and puzzles.
Learn new skills, defeat your enemies and gain ever more experience and powers in order to progress even further in this strange universe.

A skill tree will allow you to upgrade your powers and create a build in your image
But above all be careful because all power comes with a side effect. each time you use a power, you consume your own energy, until you disappear

Some skills
  • Jump
  • Double jump
  • Dash
  • Swim
  • Fly
  • Astral projection and so much more

The mysterious world is divided in several zone and each zone can be visited at any time. But some zone will be impossible to reach without some specific skills obtained elsewhere

name: 100 Keys To Your Heart
shortDesc: Figure out a way to get the correct key for every door in this sweet Puzzle Platformer game.
desc:
100 Keys To Your Heart is a sweet puzzle platformer game where you play a cute key. You must find your way back to your owner, as you open a very important gift. Along the way, you will need to look for other keys to open doors, but you can't take them all with you ! Every key you pick up makes you heavier and unable to reach certain areas. Which one to pick up and when ?



Mechanics and controls are simple, but they will make for diverse and challenging puzzles through multiple environments, each with new mechanics and new keys.



  • Easy to pick up
  • Challenging puzzles
  • 4 Environments to explore
  • 60 Keys to find
  • 8 Secret locations to discover
  • 3 Hours of gameplay

name: Cubis
shortDesc: "Cubis" is a good old classic style action puzzle. Roll the cube and and destroy the enemies and objects.
desc:
"Cubis" is a good old classic style action puzzle.
Roll the cube and and destroy the enemies and objects.

Unique character, "Cubis".


The cube "Cubis" charges energy from the ground and launches it as a shockwave.
When stored to its maximum level, the attack will knock down everything in front of it with a powerful effect.

When a certain number of energy is accumulated, the "Burst Mode" is entered.
It crushes objects and enemies on the field with its body slams.

Various stages


The levels are organized in a grid and equipped with various gimmicks.
Sometimes you will have to go through levels that are as technical as puzzles.
A unique boss appears in the final section of the world. Find out their weak points and defeat them!

Classical "destruction" pleasure


The flashy effects will create a classical exhilaration.
The background music and sound effects synchronized with the stage progression will make the game even more exciting.

name: Bremen Hot Strings
shortDesc: Bremen Hot Strings is a graphic adventure that adapts the original Brothers Grimm fairy tale "Town Musicians of Bremen" within the context of 1930s Germany under the yoke of Nazism.
desc:
"When the world is in danger, music will save the world".

Bremen Hot Strings is a graphic adventure that adapts the original Brothers Grimm fairy tale "Town Musicians of Bremen" within the context of 1930s Germany under the yoke of Nazism.

SYNOPSIS

In their dream, to give the concert of their lives and to make known the wonderful "swing life." The Bremen band Hot Strings, at the opposite of the way of thinking and acting of the current government, will be persecuted by a ruthless SS detective. Especially after the disappearance of one of the beloved members of the group which the rest will work in detective work, in order to find their friend.

FEATURES

• Visual novel: Go inside the world of Bremen Hot Strings in an old school point and click graphic adventure (Monkey Island, Hollywood Monsters, etc). Narrated with illustrations that mixes the concept art style with the European graphic novel (Blacksad, Paco Roca, etc). All of this without forgetting the inspiration coming from the wonderful 1993 movie, Swing Kids.

• Gameplay: Control the four main characters of the Bremen Hot Strings group: Vittorio, Gustave, Klaus and Federico. Each one with a characteristic ability of the animal it represents.

• Inmersive story: About twenty secondary characters will meet through the six chapters of the story, which will take place from the slums to the upper class mansions in the city of Bremen in the year 1938. Accompany our friends from BHS to overcome all their challenges and challenges, not only at a group level but also at a psychological-personal level, until they lead to different alternative endings.

name: Mofina Island
shortDesc: Mofina Island is a slow paced survival/ adventure game, where you will need to try and solve the mysteries of the island as well as survive on your own. Gather food and other resources, build tools and other items and use your GAME BUD System to defend yourself of the scary ghost attacks!
desc:
Welcome to Mofina Island! A true paradise on earth, at least if you were on vacation...

Meet Bob, a regular jack of all trades, who after an unlucky plane flight, ends up lost on a seemingly normal island. You will need to help Bob survive and try to find a way out of the island, but don't be fooled! Surviving will prove to be the easiest of your jobs... Because a deep and creepy mystery haunt the island and the future of nothing less than the whole universe is at stake!

Can Bob and his squirrel friend Sir Tails solve the mysteries of Mofina Island and save everyone's future?

name: Ladybugs and Storm
shortDesc: Ladybugs and storm is open world exploration simulation, it is about ladybugs survival through the storm, the mission is explore the towers on tiny islands for some food, so the ladybugs will survive through the storm
desc:
Ladybugs and storm is open world exploration simulation, it is about ladybugs survival through the storm, the mission is explore the towers on tiny islands for some food, so the ladybugs will survive through the storm, there are manythings you can do in the game
1.fly on the ocean
2.fly through snow storm and rain storm
3.landing on towers for sleeping
4.search and eat some food to gain energy
5.enjoy realxing storm effect

name: Noah in a Dream
shortDesc: A short single-player 3rd-person action-adventure game. Play as a boy who finds himself in a dream trying to reach school on time through a fantasy forest.
desc:
Noah in a Dream is a short single-player 3rd-person action-adventure game.

Story

Noah was always late to school and was hence bullied by his fellow students and scolded by teachers. This made him emotionally desperate and he always returned home disappointed about his day. His mother often consoled him when she found it.

But back in sleep, he had a dream of reaching school on time, passing a fantasy forest where he encountered obstacles like wild animals, deadly humans, and even monsters but he could also see his mother among them which gave him the courage to overcome them.

Features

  • Platforming
  • Puzzles
  • Combat with monsters









About developer

We are an indie game development studio with 3 members.

name: Project Feline
shortDesc: An anime-style parkour adventure! Run on walls, grind on rails & slide down hills to build momentum and traverse complex environments. Uncover the truth behind Gabi's feline abilities and find her lost family.
desc:
Community



About the Game

Project Feline™ is an anime style parkour adventure starring Gabi, an animal-human hybrid endowed with feline abilities. Players build momentum by running on walls, grinding on rails and sliding down hills to traverse complex environments as fast as possible.

Ride any surface!

Run on walls, grind rails & slide down hills at high speed to traverse complex and challenging environments.

Combo parkour moves to build insane momentum!

Gabi's advanced physics allows players to build momentum in any situation. Performing consecutive wall runs, grinds, and slides yields more speed. Master Gabi's feline abilities to maintain momentum and parkour through an anime adventure!

Uncover alternate routes and shortcuts!

Momentum is key. Master Gabi's momentum to reach alternate paths and shave vital seconds off your best time!

Explore gorgeous 3D anime environments!

Project Feline™ uses advanced techniques to faithfully emulate the hand-drawn anime look in full 3D. Lose yourself in vibrant anime cityscapes powered by Unreal® Engine!


Project Feline™ is in development and content presented is subject to change. Follow the devlogs, livestreams and development roadmap to stay updated!

name: HEROES
shortDesc: A 2D Platformer RPG game clear the stages quickly as you can. Be the fastest.
desc:
Different From the Existing Platformer Rpg Games.
Heroes can transform into an appropriate character depending on the situations.
It has three stages to defeat last stage contains Boss monsters.
Defeat the boss to win the game.
Use the right character at the right time to finish faster.
it is be fun to play

name: すいころ
shortDesc: You are now the dice, so roll you to solve the puzzle. You need to think about where you want your eyes to go, because the goal is opened by matching the designated panel on the ground with the eyes on the dice.
desc:
You are a dice.

You can roll dice because you are dice, and
You can solve puzzles because you are a dice.

"Suikoro" is waiting for you to roll as your "intuition" tells you.



Roll and step on the "designated panel" on the ground!
The "designated panel" on the ground is responsible for opening the goal. To roll to the designated panel, you need to make sure that the eyes on the panel are the same as the eyes on your top, but you change the eyes every time you roll. So, even if you roll honestly, it may not work. When that happens, I recommend that you start over, choose a different puzzle, or get away from "Suikoro" and play another game, or go outside and change your mind.



■Change your colors and change your mood!
Are your colors white, black and red? If so, try to be a different you once in a while. Choose something close to your favorite color or a color you don't normally wear and dress up in your own way, then relax and watch you roll.



■The sum of the front and back of a six-sided dice is always seven!
Did you know that? This is an amazing discovery! And this is very important for solving puzzles!

For those who want to make videos, streaming, etc..
If you wish to monetize your game by posting or distributing videos using Kobakoto's games, please note that Kobakoto will not be held responsible for any problems that may arise from such activities.

name: Future Daoshi
shortDesc: The future world is full of monsters and beasts. As a surviving Daoshi, you shoulder the mission of reviving the sect and saving mankind. Can you be the last hope for mankind in the siege of various monsters?
desc:
"Future Daoshi" is a roguelite action survival game, you must use your professional skills combined with scroll skills to survive to the end under the attack of various monsters and unlock new character skills in the process of reviving the sect to deal with a more powerful enemy.

The combat experience of extreme survival


In this Roguelike-style extreme survival game, diverse attacking enemies allow you to enjoy a hearty battle.

Various characters for you to choose from!


Various professions and skills for player to unlock challenges


Diversified moves and skill combinations

More than 50 types of skills allow you to combine, allowing you to experience the effect of 1+1 greater than 2

name: Mushroom Collector Simulator
shortDesc: Mushroom Collector Simulator is a mushroom picking simulator that involves you in the hunt for many different mushrooms that grow in the wild. Collect mushrooms, enjoy walks through the forest, complete missions, upgrade your hut and equipment.
desc:
Mushroom Collector Simulator is a mushroom picking simulator in which you'll roam familiar forests and meadows to collect the best mushrooms in the wild.
Collect mushrooms, enjoy forest walks, complete quests, upgrade your hut and equipment, and much more.
You can start with over 50 species of real mushrooms found in the vast expanses of European forests.
Hundreds more species of mushrooms and new stunning areas and features are coming in the future.

GAME FEATURES:

■ Large open world areas.

■ Complex, realistic algorithm for procedurally generating mycelium and mushroom growth.

■ Various weather conditions.

■ Different seasons.

■ over 50 species of real mushrooms, both edible and inedible, Encyclopedia of Mushrooms.

■ Classification of mushrooms by species, rarity and value.

■ Improvement of the mushroom picker's hut and equipment.

■ Simplified survival aspects such as hunger, thirst and fatigue.

■ Terrain orientation: with compass and binoculars.

name: Math Ball
shortDesc: "Math Ball" - a game where you can relax and hone your math skills by solving challenging problems on the go, dodging wrong decisions, and running out of time!
desc:
"Math Ball" - a game where you can relax and hone your math skills by solving challenging problems on the go, dodging wrong decisions, and running out of time!

"Math Ball" is a game with solving mathematical problems that become more difficult with each passage, and time is limited and all that remains for the player is to make lightning-fast decisions and show all his dexterity and attentiveness.

Game Features:
  • Cool visual style
  • Maths education
  • Increasing difficulty
  • Steam Achievements support

name: Native Problems
shortDesc: "Native Problems" is a 2D top down game about an Indian who beats the souls in the form of skulls towards the evil spirits that are chasing the player. With every new level, evil spirits become stronger and angrier, and you need to have time to save ladies and stay alive.
desc:
"Native Problems" is a 2D top down game about an Indian who beats the souls in the form of skulls towards the evil spirits that are chasing the player. With every new level, evil spirits become stronger and angrier, and you need to have time to save ladies and stay alive.

A brave warrior from a great tribe accidentally summons evil spirits and now he needs to fight them off, saving accidentally lost madams along the way.

Game Features:
  • Nice Pixel Art style
  • Increasing Difficulty
  • Cool OST
  • Steam Achievements support
  • Family friendly gameplay

name: Primal Age
shortDesc: "Primal Age" is a 2D top-down battle royale game. The player must dodge enemy attacks, collect meat from enemies and be able to collect more food before the end of each round. The level is constantly getting smaller, so only one will survive!
desc:
"Primal Age" is a 2D top-down battle royale game. The player must dodge enemy attacks, collect meat from enemies and be able to collect more food before the end of each round. The level is constantly getting smaller, so only one will survive!

In the Stone Ages, when the life of the first humans depended on amount of meat they had, a new danger appeared - wild forest fires! An uncontrollable fire is surrounding the camp of primitive people and forces them for a massive battle for food!

Game Features:
  • Battle Royale mechanics
  • Nice Pixel Art style
  • Challenging gameplay
  • Steam Achievements support

name: List: Game of Candles
shortDesc: “List: Game of Candles” is a single player first-person horror game that takes your character back to grandma’s house. As a requirement of your inheritance you must survive five nights in her home. She’s left you with a set of instructions to aid in your survival.
desc: “List: Game of Candles” is a single player first-person horror game that takes your character back to grandma’s house. As a requirement of your inheritance you must survive five nights in her home. She’s left you with a set of instructions to aid in your survival - but you have to choose your difficulty and make sure you keep up with all the tasks on her list - much more than once. List will get your adrenaline pumping by managing all of these horrible household tasks such as keeping candles lit, feeding the thing in the basement and making sure that baby doll doesn’t make it to the door - but be sure to never turn your back on an open window - or else. Packed full of jump scares and frightening sound and lighting effects List combines all of your worst childhood nightmares with fast-paced gameplay. You’ll have to play more than once to survive.

Super recommend it!if you love 5 night, this game is for you. put ob some headphone and listen to the foot step..Really nice horror jump scare game! The game really pulls you in the whole atmosphere. name: A Game You Can Afford In This Economy
shortDesc: Everything is getting unaffordably expensive. Groceries. Bills. How long is this even sustainable? Enter the world of the protagonist, and find out if you have what it takes to turn your life around. A point-and-click, choice-driven adventure of modern survival.
desc:
Description

You wake up in your squalid apartment. Your phone screen is horribly cracked, and the alarm won't shut off. You're so tired... you aren't even sure which job you're supposed to go to today.

Everything is getting more expensive. Unaffordably expensive. Groceries. Bills. How much more can you take? How can this even be sustainable?

Do you have what it takes to handle the struggle? Can you figure out a way to make it to a better life? To get out of this rut, and finally get your head above water? Enter the world of the protagonist, and find out if you can withstand the seemingly relentless hardship life is throwing at you. Or will you fall by the wayside - another chewed-up casualty of our unforgiving system? You can't control your luck, but your choices are all up to you...

Features

  • Point-and-Click interactions
  • Choice-driven narratives
  • Exposition regarding the futility of modern life
  • Puzzles
  • Multiple endings
  • Anxiety and existential dread
  • Steam achievements

Screenshots

name: Slime Evolution
shortDesc: A survival roguelike where you play a slime wandering a forest. As you eat resources and fight monsters, you evolve and get ever stronger! But as you unbalance the forest and draw attention of stronger opponents, how long can you survive?
desc:
You are a slime. Eat resources to determine your starting element then fight monsters and evolve to get stronger. The stronger you become, the more monsters will be drawn to you.
Can you survive their ever increasing amounts and new monsters joining in to hunt you down? But those that unsettle the balance of the forest might draw unwanted attention.
You play a slime that eats resources and monsters to grow stronger. Move around the map to attack them, but don't get too close or they might overwhelm you. Survive for as long as you can, because once you die it is all over. No progress carries over and you will start over from scratch.
Go down 7 different elemental paths to defeat your enemies and consume their drops to evolve even further to fight the onslaught of new enemies that appear the stronger you get.
reviews:
1 user reviewsGot all the upgrades within 17 minutes. After that some knights get spawned until you die. No more progression.
So essentially, 7 bucks for 17 minutes of gameplay.

name: Aim Expert
shortDesc: Aim Expert is the perfect tool to test your limits in fun unique challenges and train using the best routines and training modes to become an expert aimer yourself.
desc:
WARNING! After training using Aim Expert you will be called a cheater.

Test your skills in fun and unique scenarios!



Train and become an Aim Expert yourself!



Aim training doesn't have to be boring!

name: Dwarven Mercenaries
shortDesc: Dwarven Mercenaries - Co-op, True first person, melee based adventure game set in the fantasy Dwarven Kingdom.
desc:
To Arms Mercenaries!

As war rages, and the army is busy on the battlefield, It's up to you to do the dirty job.

As king started a campaign to retake Old Kingdom of Dwarfs, Te`Ren Shatqal, Our Kingdom is in danger as it was never before.

Viir, the cave dwellers, Is at the gates to our Kingdom. They dig their tunnels, ambush our citizens, steal our resources!

Assemble the Group, up to 4 Dwarfs.
Or
Test Yourself and go on the mission alone.

  • Gather resources.

  • Craft new Weapons and Armor.

  • Enchant them with Runes and Mechanisms.

  • Stop the Viir's advance!

The Kingdom counts on You.
reviews:

This is the sort of thing that I would be excited to see MUCH later in the development cycle. Take it off steam, develop it more, get through the alpha phase and THEN once it is polished, put it back on steam.
Can't recommend it at the moment.

name: Shifted Heart
shortDesc: Explore, fight, and discover new spells and abilities in the world of Shifted Heart! Customize your build to your liking and save the province of Shutterweld, and perhaps the rest of the world, from certain doom.
desc:
Shifted Heart is a 2D Sidescrolling Metroidvania. Progression will be tied to clever use of abilities learned through exploration. How will you scale this cliff? Navigate past these obstacles? Clear that huge chasm? Take down this tough boss? If you can find a clever way to use your known spells, you will craft your own answer to these questions, and many more!


With the last of my strength... I send you

A great darkness has fallen over the world, and yet, the area around Shutterweld seems to have been spared for a time. You awaken deep underground with no memory, and a voice requesting the world be returned to how it should be.

You play as a creature called a Shifter by the locals. Capable of transforming your body into any shape to achieve your goals. Take heed, the forces of nature don't seem to be too friendly to your kind. Luckily, and quite conveniently, all of the abilities you learn have combat applications!

Features

  • 8 distinct areas to explore
  • 15 spells to mix and match to your liking
  • Over 30 enemy types to destroy
  • 7(?) bosses to conquer
  • Some lore for the curious types

name: Die in the Dungeon: PROLOGUE
shortDesc: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this deck-building, turn-based roguelike where you don't use cards, but dice! Deal with enemies by combining powerful dice on your board, boost their effects with magical relics, and risk it all hoping for a good roll on unexpected encounters.
desc:
Wishlist the full version coming in 2023!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2026820/Die_in_the_Dungeon/


About the Game



This is the free version of Die in the Dungeon, a deck-building, turn-based roguelite where your deck is not made out of cards, but DICE!

In Die in the Dungeon, each dice represents a different action, from basic ones like attacking or healing, to boosting other dice or copying their abilities. Place dice on your board to unlock their powers, but be careful... not any place will do! The way you arrange your dice on the board will affect how good your turn is. Try to find the best combination while you upgrade your deck and collect new, stronger dice with unique abilities.

Prologue Features

  • Fight your way through 20+ floors with increasingly difficult encounters. With more than 10 different enemies, 2 bosses and multiple special events, you're getting a massive amount of content completely for free!
  • Collect dice, make them stronger with special properties and craft the ultimate deck. All dice have base effects, which in turn can be combined with powerful modifiers to reduce their cost (Hollow) or make them stay longer on the board (Heavy), among many others!
  • Replay and refine your strategy until you reach the final floor. Who is waiting for you at the end of the dungeon? Face familiar foes, learn the truth about this endless cycle and dare stepping even farther with the brand new Endless Mode!

1 user reviews[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Tsubaki Hata is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Unreal Quality Games/Rosa Special Studio, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 64 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Unreal Quality Games/Rosa Special Studio.

General


Pichi Girl is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls

Incredible Atmosphere, Great Music, lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.
The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.

Features

  • Several difficulty levels.
  • Relaxing gameplay
  • 5 HD quality art with beautiful girls
  • Pleasant atmosphere.

Game Modes:


  • EASY - 4x4
  • MEDIUM - 4x6
  • ADVANCED - 6x10
  • HARD - 8x14
  • EPIC- 10x16

name: Stream Runners: Heroes
shortDesc: Stream Runners: Heroes is a retro style idle game for live streamers to play with their viewers on Twitch. Players can add Runners to the game to fight enemies, earn points, and defeat bosses. There are many ways to use this game with your community, it's all up to you and your chat!
desc:
Stream Runners: Heroes is a retro style idle game for live streamers with Twitch Affiliate or Twitch Partner status. The host will start the game and go live on Twitch, letting their viewers (or chat) add Runners to the battle in one of three lanes using Twitch channel points.

The game includes 6 themes with sprite designs to match the theme. You can choose a theme based on your personal style, or to match whichever game you are playing.

Fantasy
Cyberpunk
Gothic
Aqua
Super
Magical

The game can be played by thousands of players, all streamed live on your screen. There are many ways to use this game with your community, it's all up to you and your chat.

name: Wyoming Winter
shortDesc: A group of employees find themselves snowed in to the Wyoming department of defence building as a blizzard covers the state. You'll soon find out your group is not the only thing trapped in the building.
desc:
In Wyoming Winter you and a group of fellow employees find yourselves snowed in to the Wyoming department of defence building as a blizzard covers the state. You'll soon find out your group is not the only thing trapped in the building. Find unique hiding spots, help your fellow employees, complete risky lockdown tasks and find a weapon to fight back.

Hide in. Hold out. Don't be found.


Wyoming Winter is a multiplayer game where one person in the lobby is chosen at random to be the Blight, an almost invincible, fast moving, dark creature that escaped from the lower levels of the Wyoming facility. The rest of the players are employees who's job it is to stop the Blight from escaping the facility. Employees need to either have at least one member alive after 10 minutes or kill the Blight using weapons that can be unlocked from weapon lockers after an employee finishes their list of tasks.

Wyoming Winter is best played with 3-8 players. Servers are available in Europe, America & Asia.


Employee's start with a notepad of tasks and a watch. The notebook contains a list of tasks to be completed before the employee is given a final task to locate a weapon. The watch shows how much time the Blight has left to escape. If the timer ends with at least one employee still alive, the employees will win. The Blight has heightened vision and can see well in dark places along with incredible strength that allows it to snap the neck of any employee in an instant. Both the Blight & employees can climb and crouch into unique and crafty hiding places using the climbing system.
reviews: 8 user reviewsThis game is gobsmackering. I think it would benefit it to add a mode were players can play against a NPC blight, also it would be amazing to see some sort of multiplayer campaign. Other than that this game is awesome.When you can climb on anything and then go in the vents, a great hide and seek game and the graphics are 10/10Id give this game 9 straw hat goofies out of 10.game got spots wear you can get stuck on top of roof and spots where you can be completely invisible and it gave me blight 9 times in a row when playing with a mate

name: Grimfield Mystery
shortDesc: Grimfield Mystery is a Mysterious Point-and-Click Action Adventure!
desc:
Explore and uncover the Spooky Mysteries surrounding Grimfield in this Point-And-Click Action Adventure!

About Grimfield


Grimfield is a small town that has drawn attention by mysterious and unexplained events that have recently taken place there.

As Lucas’ parents are in love with everything related to the paranormal, the family traveled to Grimfield’s forest to investigate…

The Amulet


On their way to Grimfield, a mysterious object was given to them, an antique amulet…

This magic amulet summons a magic hand that becomes an extension of Lucas, allowing him to activate and grab elements far from him!

Game Features


  • Unique Point-and-Click + Action gameplay!
  • Great 3D + 2D Cartoonish Art style!
  • Mysterious adventure!
  • Awesome OST!


Nachon Lab
Ogre Pixel
2022

name: Turbo Fat
shortDesc: A tasty twist on the classic block stacker! Spin, squish and combine pieces to serve up delicious desserts. Explore 100 scrumptious levels, each with unique surprises and hilarious gimmicks. Grow your restaurant empire with the mysterious Fat Sensei, catering to a cast of colorful creatures.
desc:
Turbo Fat was inspired by block-stacking games of the 90s, but builds on them with new pieces, new moves, new ways to score, and hilarious level gimmicks! Misdrop a piece? Use a squish move to fix it! Want higher scores? Build up a combo of 10 lines, 20 lines, 100 lines... there is no limit! Waiting for that crucial line piece? Don't wait long, we got rid of those! (Hey, nobody said it would be easy...)

Fun and Forgiving for New Puzzlers

Pieces in Turbo Fat can squish through tiny gaps, making it easier to recover from misdrops. Filling up your playfield is fine, too! You don't have to start over. And if you want more help, a set of in-game tutorials guides you through the basics.

Extreme Challenges for Puzzle Pros

The toughest levels require both expert strategy and blinding finger speed! Arrange pieces into boxes to make high-scoring cakes. String together combos of cakes to keep customers in their seats, and really pack on those calories! The unique control scheme lets you move and lock pieces on the first frame they spawn, allowing for some ridiculous high speed shenanigans.

There's Something for Everyone

Explore over 100 different levels, each with their own unique twists! Hone your strategies in practice mode, then carry your skills over to Career mode where you can unlock new areas, new levels, and meet a cavalcade of colorful creatures as you expand your restaurant empire.

Features

Sprawling Story. The game's unique career mode gives you a new selection of levels each time you play. Progress though 7 regions each with their own cutscenes and characters.

Clever Levels. Unlock over 100 different levels in career mode, each with their own clever gimmicks.

Different ways to practice. Hone your basic skills in the game's Training Modes such as score attack and time attack. Or try Sandbox mode, a more casual mode where you can play forever without worrying about winning or losing.

Climb the Ranks. Prove your skill an in an escalating set of rank challenges designed to test your limits.

Cute creatures. Creatively combine over 80 creature parts to make your own unique monster. Or, introduce yourself to dozens of cute community-generated creatures and customers in the game's story and puzzles.

Banging tunes. An original 19-song soundtrack composed by Pete Ellison of Diskowarp Records. Your toes will get some exercise as they tap along to these infectious beats.

name: Recoil VS The World
shortDesc: Use the recoil of your guns to make it to get to the end of these saw blade-filled labyrinths! Turn lasers off, switch guns mid-level, and much more throughout 3 different biomes, each with their own new obstacles and levels to make a fun but rage-inducing experience!
desc:
Using the recoil of your guns, you shoot your way through claustrophobic saw blade filled levels. Turn lasers off, switch guns mid-level, and much more throughout 3 different biomes, each with their own new obstacles and levels to make a fun but rage-inducing experience!

Features:
3 biomes filled with 10 levels + new and exciting obstacles and guns!
Cute and cartoony pixel graphics!
Juicy and good-feeling gameplay throughout!
30 levels are getting harder and harder!

name: Ghost Guy
shortDesc: A short survival adventure game where you play as a ghost exploring an abandoned mansion.
desc:
In this short adventure game, explore an abandoned mansion as a ghost. Collect items to help you along the way. Find secrets hidden around the house and find multiple endings

-Collect up to 50 souls hidden throughout the mansion
-Find health and speed boosts
-Collect and wear 9 different hats
-Explore strange rooms of the house
-Multiple story endings to discover

name: Mr.Wise
shortDesc: Mr. Wise is an adventure visual novel with multiple endings. The events in the game revolve around two archaeology professors and their unlikely discovery which can re-write the history itself. But Mr. Wise has another plans for their plans.
desc:
Mr. Wise is an interactive visual novel with multiple endings. Story of this game is about two archaeology professors who are friends for long years and their weird discovery which they call "The Tablet"

Two friends; Mavera and Selnan try to decide whether they should get help from a renowned figure called Mr. Wise to decipher The Tablet's elusive secrets, while trying to find their way when the things got out of hand in this adventure visual novel.

While the professors try to protect The Tablet and themselves from the formidable schemes they face, the events will unfold ever unpredictably. Every secret they reveal will be endangering them, their loved ones and even the world itself.

You will be playing as one of these two professors, Selnan or Mavera; who have no other expertise than their profession. You will try to survive the physical dangers by using your not very physical skill set.

Or, if you could discover the real nature of The Tablet, there remains no danger that can reach you... Who knows?

name: A Shaman's Ballard
shortDesc: Explore the mysterious world of Erenblad to protect the land from demonic entities and perform your shanar to become the new master shaman of Aahkray in this tactical turn-based RPG.
desc:
A shaman's ballard tells the story of Melody, a shaman apprentice summoned by the ancient goddess to go on a pilgrim journey for her shanar, the rite of initiation to the order of Aahkray. It turns out Erenblad holds more secrets than anticipated and Melody must use her sound bending abilities not only to reach the goddess, but also to protect the land from imminent danger.

Inspired by real shamanism.

FEATURES​
  • Explore a colorful and mysterious world
  • A pilgrim journey filled with danger
  • Strong focus on tactical combat, storytelling and aesthetics
  • Tactical turn-based RPG
  • Cute main characters in anime style

CHARACTERS


Melody - shaman apprentice and sound bender


Sacrista - wind archer


Aju - shaman priest and shadow bender


Squalus - water/lightning arch mage

name: PinCOL
shortDesc: PinCOL is an addictive Action 2D Space Shooter, a fast tactical Bullet Hell with Upgrade elements and Special abilities to obtain, the Color Damage Mechanics will drive you Crazy !!!
desc:
PinCOL is an addictive Action 2D Space Shooter, the Color Damage Mechanics will drive you Crazy !!!
Destroy Enemies, collect Pins and use them to Upgrade Weapons and Ship.
Get Experience in Roguelikemode to Unlock new Ships with Special Powers

-Main Color Mechanics: The Player Ship can change Color between RED and BLUE, you can be damaged by enemy weapons only if opposite color, same thing with your weapons versus the enemies.
-WEAPONS: Bullet, Missile, Laser, Mine, Flak
-ITEMS: 8 Special Technology to obtain

-Story Mode:
A solar system fully explorable, defend Planets by destroying all Enemies spawned from Wormholes to get new Items and unlock the Planet's Base station, Mining Station and Refinery, build Mining Drones to get materials from Asteroids, refining into Pins. Other 3 Alien Stations are the second harder objective.

-Roguelike Mode:
A mode where you have initially one Ship to select at Start, destroy Waves of Enemies to obtain XP and get Upgrades Cards to improve Weapons and Ship Stats. Unlock New Ships gaining Experience every Run.

NOTE:
Story Mode: under Development, partially completed.
Roguelike Mode: Completed with 5 Zones, planned new Zones and Upgrades in next Updates

name: Blocktiful
shortDesc: A relaxing puzzle game where you combine resources and create your own amazing world.
desc:
Blocktiful is a relaxing puzzle/sandbox game.
Combine resources and find recipes to create your own little world. Refine your created landscapes by changing the look of your recipes, whether on land or in the sea.
Gradually unlock new resources or features that, for example, change your world to a certain season.
Rebuild certain templates to make your world special.

There is no specific goal. Let your creativity run wild and build a world the way you like it!

Blocktiful is inspired by the great games Townscaper, Islanders and Dorfromantik.

name: ShovelBear
shortDesc: Shovel Bear is a platform fighter with a focus on block breaking and EPIC power ups. Smack your adversaries with shovels, and survive as best you can. Can you dig it? O_o
desc: Get ready for action packed battles with bears and SHOVELS. Shovel Bear is a platform fighter with unique power ups taking inspiration from video games and ANIME. The goal of the game is simple: smack, bop, dig, and stomp your enemy bear in a 1v1 to launch them off the map and prove yourself to be the best SHOVEL BEAR! Choose from 4 unique maps, with more in development. Enjoy a carefully crafted OST as you battle your friends and CPU's in the most unique platform fighter to date! This is the game you didn't ask for, but you TOTALLY NEED!
reviews: 1 user reviewsThis was indeed a game. There were controls and graphics. But needs more bears and shovels.

name: MopGarden's Veggie Cart
shortDesc: MopGarden’s Veggie Cart is a fast-paced, simulation game where you feed hungry bunnies lots of healthy vegetables! Can you feed them all in time?
desc:
MopGarden’s Veggie Cart is a fast-paced, simulation game where you feed hungry bunnies lots of healthy vegetables! Can you feed them all in time?

MopGarden, a variety Twitch streamer, has decided to feed all the local bunnies in her town. As business begins to boom, she moves her veggie cart to other surrounding areas, where the vegetable orders get faster, and faster, and FASTER.

Features

  • Play through 4+ different worlds, each with varying difficulties. Bunnies are hungrier and more demanding at different times of day!
  • Test your visual skills and reaction time. As you progress through the game, it gets harder and harder to determine what the bunnies are ordering
  • Look out for other pesky animals! Other animals will drop in to throw a wrench into the vegetable orders.
  • No bad stuff! This game is completely free to play. No advertisements, in-app purchases, or anything of the sort.
  • No animals were harmed in the making of this game!

name: The Fallen Night
shortDesc: Dominate the battlefield with your cold, ruthless warrior skills and engage in deadly battles.
desc:
Become an authentic and ruthless warrior of the Middle Ages fighting deadly battles with a quality combat system based on research, something completely different from the genre that can amaze you, what are you waiting for? Master the battlefield with your authentic skills.

Note: It is not an authentic combat simulator but it is extremely realistic in combat.

Includes:
8 Maps
2 Modes (+2 Mode in development)
1 Mode Decorator
8 Armies (+6 Armies in development)
Offline Features (+Online Features in Development)

name: Seed of Pandora: Legend of the Gaia Tree
shortDesc: Embark on an epic adventure across the continent of Pandora as you meet helpful companions along the way that will become lifelong friends. Discover the many secrets of this fully realized 16 bit style world. Beautiful anime cutscenes bring the story to life with gorgeous hand drawn art.
desc:
Introduction

Seed of Pandora is a throwback RPG in the classic 16 bit pixel art style. Embark on an epic adventure across the continent of Pandora as you meet helpful companions along the way that will become lifelong friends. Discover the many secrets of this fully realized 16 bit world. Beautiful anime cutscenes bring the story to life with gorgeous hand drawn art. With a fast paced turn-based battle system Seed of Pandora feels like a game made in the golden era of RPG's, but with many modern day quality of life improvements and an emphasis on fun gameplay.

The Story

The Kingdom of Garda, in the southernmost continent of Pandora. Here lies the great Gaia Tree, the tree of life. The seeds of the Gaia Tree are said to have given rise to all life in the world.


The Gaia Sect, a group of monks originally tasked with protecting the Gaia Tree, banished to the endless southern seas by the first King of Garda. They stood accused of heresy and abusing the power they derived from the Gaia Tree's magical seeds.

Over a century has passed since the war against the Gaia Sect. The citizens of Garda enjoy a simple life of relative peace.

This is where our adventure begins...

name: Asunder
shortDesc: Asunder is Hack & Slash Action RPG which allows you to switch between your party members at will. If you encounter a difficult foe you can Asunder and tackle it together. Will you survive long enough to discover how these souls came to inhabit the one body.
desc:
Three strangers awake trapped inside a single body, with no recollection of how this came to be. Your quest is for them to permanently Asunder, Along the way you explore an Open world, Enter Dungeons, Slay Creatures, Collect Loot. All the major Hits in this fantasy Action RPG. Every night Skeletons will attack the main town killing the towns folk, construct defences to help out.

KEY FEATURES

  • Switch between the party members depending on the situation, Also for a limited time you can Asunder when all your party fights together to bring down a specifically difficult foe.
  • Its realtime but you have the ability to pause and also view the scene from three different camera viewpoints, 1. Isometric, 2. A Birds eye view, 3. Behind the player
  • The ability to Craft Items, Cast Spells, Control Power Runes, Hire Mercenaries
  • There are numerous dungeons scattered throughout the map

name: Boom 2020
shortDesc: A game to test your true ability in FPS shooters. Boom2020 take Revenge on the killers of your love Mona in a fast paced deathly shooter.
desc:
BOOM 2020 is a hardcore shooter which is a sequel to BOOM 2019.

It continues the story of Boomer our hero as he takes on a mission to take down another corp which is producing robots used for war. Moving through the levels of this building you are being attacked by safety measures such as lighting being turn off, elevator doors being locked, but nothing can stand in your way as you came prepared. but are you ready for the truth, and reality of this mission.


BOOM 2020 features a killer Shotgun with satisfying kills as enemies blow up with each of the Cannon like rounds shot.

While Boom 2020 is a short game it features great fast paced levels which require mastery to come up with cool and awesome runs.

Each level is unique and can be completed in multiple ways, there is no single straight path to each level, some paths can be easier than others.

this game is ment to be played in one sitting, roughly 1-3 hours.

name: The Dungeon Rules
shortDesc: The Dungeon Rules is the most challenging game you can currently face. This game is a dungeon crawler with sokoban puzzles and cards combat.
desc:
The Dungeon Rules is the most challenging puzzle game you can currently face. This game is a combination of dungeon crawler, sokoban puzzles and card combat.

DUNGEON CRAWLER
In The Dungeon Rules you will have to explore and find the exit of each dungeon to access the next one. Along the way you will find all kinds of obstacles and enemies.


SOKOBAN PUZZLES
You will have to activate mechanisms and levers to open doors, build bridges, lower spikes, move walls and unblock all kinds of obstacles to reach the exit.


MAGIC
Magic will help you in your adventure. You will use spells to throw fireballs, break walls, go through walls or move objects at a distance. You will also find magic portals to teleport you from one place to another.


TRAPS
Spikes, pits, explosives, rolling rocks... You will have to avoid these traps. But you can also use them to unlock the path or to destroy enemies.


COMBAT WITH CARDS
You are not alone. The dungeons are populated by skeletons that you will have to face with courage. You can destroy them with traps, with magic or in combat.


The Dungeon Rules challenge you.
50 handmade levels are waiting for you.
Do you think you can?

name: IWOCon™ 2
shortDesc: IWOCon is a virtual gaming conference. Why do conventions need to be conventional? Explore gaming booths & more all done in a TPS game! Fly across the galaxy, visit space stations & drive between extraterrestrial cities & bases, all while controlling customizable avatars!
desc:
NEWSLETTER


  • Sign up to find out when applications open, release dates, & more!


About the Game

IWOCon™ 2 - A Sci-fi Convention



An unconventional indie game convention.

Imagine an action shooter game where you can discover a galaxy of cool indie games because that is what IWOCon 2 is.

Features


  • Free to play.
  • Sci-fi action shooting.
  • Custom avatars.
  • Fly spaceships. Go zoom.
  • Exploration.
  • Loot.
  • Indie Games.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2212710/IWOCon_2/

Exploration



You'll get to explore different cities, planets, & space stations.

You'll also get to fly around fast spaceships, control drones, & interact with NPCs.

Don't forget to customize your avatar plus collect a bunch of loot!

Free to Experience



Can you imagine it? Well don't, coz that's what you get, and you get it for FREE!

Ultimately IWOCon™ ( pronounced "Eye-Woe-Con") is all about YOU, the gamer, and satisfying your desire to play and find cool games.

name: DAB 12
shortDesc: A 2D platformer about vanquishing capitalizm
desc: DAB 12 is the sequel to the eleven-game series 1trickPwnyta created in her teenage years, and is the first of the series to be published online. In this 2D platforming action-adventure game, you control Dab, the hero of the universe, as he traverses the various enemy-filled biomes of the planet Midhia, including the forest, the volcano, and the jungle island, to defeat the business suit-wielding Capitilizts. Collect powerups to increase your health and attack power, and use your trusty spear to vanquish The Capitilizts, skeletons, sentient mushrooms, massive rock golems, and more!

name: The Asher Asylum
shortDesc: Explore the abandoned Asher Asylum in an effort to find a missing cop. Learn about the horrors plaguing the old asylum, and try to find a way to stop its cursed residents from leaving. This indie horror FPS is designed as a throw-back to the late 2000s indie horror scene.
desc:
Explore the abandoned Asher Asylum in an effort to find a missing cop. Learn about the horrors plaguing the old asylum, and try to find a way to stop its cursed residents from leaving.
This indie horror FPS is designed as a throw-back to the late 2000s indie horror scene, complete with collectibles, pages of lore, inventory management, clunky combat, and multiple endings, all intended to capture the glory days of internet horror games, both the good parts and the bad parts.
