name: VR Archeology: Secrets of Kulikovo Field
shortDesc: What mysteries and keys to historical secrets are hidden underground? In this interactive VR game, you will explore the roles of modern archaeologists, restoration experts and re-enactors. Discover dozens of unique artifacts dating back to the Battle of Kulikovo on this thrilling expedition.
desc:
Fought on September 8, 1380, the Battle of Kulikovo is considered one of the biggest events of the 14th century that united Rus peoples. Scientists continue searching for traces of the battle. Now you can also join an archaeological expedition, find and restore artifacts to re-enact those historical events.

Swords and spears, armor and arrows, coins and bullets. Dig into the artifacts from different eras with the opportunities offered by a field laboratory. Game developers spent time in the Kulikovo Field Museum depository to recreate accurate copies of real archaeological finds collected over decades.

Learn about Russian warriors’ full armor and its actual weight, and archers’ medieval multitool. You can witness scenes from across the ages that the Kulikovo Field remembers.

Reconstruct a combat bow and test it at a shooting range. Pick an arrowhead to hit different types of armor. Practice your aiming skills and get promoted to the next military rank.
reviews:
3 user reviewsVR Archeology: Secrets of Kulikovo Field is a free VR experience by a Russian dev about Russian ancient history.  It worked on my HTC Vive system to a point. 

 Epic game breaking bug, stuck in tutorial, cannot teleport, cannot progress further,  because of bad binding for Vive. 

Don't bother downloading this broken free "game".The tutorial said press the touchpad to teleport, but it's the menu button on the wand that actually caused teleportation. The tutorial would not progress past this step for me.tried playing multiple times and when it finaly did work i couldnt even move in game with the settings they had.

name: Benighted
shortDesc: John Hope will have to find his wife, abducted by unknown creatures after a traffic accident. And survive at any cost...
desc:
Immerse yourself in a rather dark and cruel world together with the main character and try to find your wife.
On your way, the most diverse and bloodthirsty creatures that you can only meet will be waiting for you, and danger will be waiting for you around every corner!

The player is waiting for a journey through the most terrible and scary places of this world!

Fear and horror

At every corner, at every turn, scary and creepy monsters are waiting for the player, ready to tear him apart!

Weapons

Of the weapons you will have only 2 types of shotguns, one hunting rifle and a crossbow. But the number of rounds is limited! We recommend using them wisely.

name: Dragonium Adventure
shortDesc: Fight and make your way through the world of Akinori in this strategic turn-based RPG! Defeat powerful enemies, complete the intriguing story mode, upgrade your character, unlock new skills and join the fray in online multiplayer mode!
desc:
JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER


About the Game

Simple but complex gameplay

Dragonium Adventure is a turn-based combat RPG that uses a few simple fundamental mechanics: Attack, Defense and Objects. During the course of your adventure you will clash with many enemies, one more powerful than the other: to face them, you will need to constantly change and improve your strategy, and to do so, you will have to make use of new fighting techniques and tools. Learn to master these elements and become Akinori's best fighter!


Story mode

Akinori has been quiet for millennia since the last sighting of a monster, but apparently these mysterious creatures have made their appearance again - it's up to you to figure out what's happening and restore peace to the kingdom. Fight, improve and save Akinori: the three keywords to describe the story mode of Dragonium Adventure are these.


  • More than 8 zones to complete with 5 levels per zone, divided into 3 normal levels, 1 mini-boss and 1 boss!
  • Improve your character by acquiring more powerful fighting techniques!
  • Free Akinori from the malus and find out what's happening!

Add spice to the fight!

The fighting techniques are many: from those that only hit the enemy and inflict damage on him, to those that restore your health, guarantee you an advantage in battle and more. By defeating enemies, you will earn experience points which you will need to fill your experience bar. Once filled, you will get a Skill Point, which you can exchange to acquire new fighting techniques through the Tree of Knowledge. Master the fighting techniques and create a moveset suitable for the situation!
You will be able to use the fighting techniques learned in the story mode even in the online multiplayer mode!


Rush mode

Defeat many enemies, one after the other, and try to survive! The more enemies you defeat, the higher the final reward! Plan a winning strategy and you will prevail!
Rush mode is great for earning Skill Points and acquiring fighting techniques that are impossible to achieve in story mode. You will be able to expand your strategy and show it off in online multiplayer battles!

To unlock this mode, you need to finish the main campaign in order to familiarize yourself with the combat system and master basic combat techniques.

Online multiplayer

Battle against friends or strangers in online multiplayer mode - show what you are made of to the whole world!

  • Play fast and carefree matches in Quick Match mode
  • Defeat co-op bosses with a teammate in Raid Mode
  • Take part in exciting strategy-packed battles in Competitive Mode to climb the world rankings

To unlock this mode, you need to finish the main campaign in order to familiarize yourself with the combat system and master basic combat techniques.

name: A Matter of Principle
shortDesc: A Matter of Principle is an interactive historical comic in visual novel format. You have to participate in one of the most high-profile events of the XX century.
desc:
Here is an interactive comics novel about one of the most high-profile events of the 20th century. There are many theories about what exactly happened on June 28, 1914 in Sarajevo. A deliberate attempt? A tragic accident? Masonic conspiracy?

The Bosnian Serb Gavrilo Princip killed the heir to the Austro-Hungarian throne, Franz Ferdinand, which became a formal reason to start the first world war of its kind ... But who was Princip and what led him to this act? Who was Franz Ferdinand and how did he meet that fateful day? What do they have in common and could war have been avoided?

Inside the game you will find answers to these questions, as well as the majestic interiors of Austria-Hungary and the nature of the Balkan Peninsula from the pen of Askold Akishin, one of the greatest comics artists.

Game Features:

  • The recognizable style of Askold Akishin - dynamic black and white expressive drawings made in a comics style panels,
  • Complete, gripping story,
  • Interactive polling system,
  • Quiz,
  • Luxurious gallery from different artists,
and much more!

Embark on an exciting journey to the beginning of the 20th century and see the origins of the first World War of its kind.

If you are not familiar with the history of Gavrilo Princip and Franz Ferdinand, this will be the most fascinating history lesson of your life. If you are familiar, you will find a unique immersion in that era, you will be able to see the significant events of those years, as well as consider this amazing story from different angles, in detail.

name: Spotted
shortDesc: Spotted is a horror stealth game about breaking into a house to find your lost brother. Play against an advanced AI that will adapt to your actions. Explore the house and outsmart the systems to uncover the truth.
desc:
Spotted is a stealth horror game that challenges you to sneak into a man's house to uncover the horrific truth he is keeping.



Interact with the environment to unlock certain accesses to advance by avoiding an advanced AI that will adapt to your actions so distract the enemy by throwing an object but clear out before the enemies detect your position. Hide and let the danger pass, or try to escape your pursuer. Play your way, but be prepared to adapt.

name: Bullet Destroyer
shortDesc: Destroy hordes of enemies and try to survive as much as possible. Bullet Destroyer is a first person shooter where you have to fight against hordes of enemies.
desc:
Destroy hordes of enemies and try to survive as much as possible. Bullet Destroyer is a first person shooter where you have to fight against hordes of enemies.

Bullet Destroyer is a first-person shooter with minimalist graphics. Here you have to fight hundreds of different opponents, and in order to survive you need to collect gold and upgrade your character.

Functions:

Shooting - here you do not need to worry about ammo and reloading, shoot non-stop to survive.
Pumping - upgrade your character to fight back enemies.
A variety of enemies - there are many types of enemies, and even more enemies themselves.

name: Project Ruins
shortDesc: Project Ruins is a Top-Down RPG/JRPG with turn-based combat. Welcome to the land of Mothreia.
desc:
The name ' Project Ruins ' is just the working title name. Once the correct images have been made for the actual Title name it will be changed.
This game is a Top-Down RPG/JRPG with Turn-Based combat. This Is also a Passion Project so please don't expect anything amazing or spectacular with art style or any fancy shading.

In a land where there was once color, Kingdoms lie in ruins waiting to be restored from the clutches of darkness and corruption. It is up to you, to restore color to the land and bring an end to the evil which took it over.
Journey across the land of Mothreia and defeat the evil, one area at a time. Explore dungeons, fight in boss battles, collect armors, meet new allies for your group and restore color to the land of Mothreia in the realm of Tozerath.

name: Delivoo Delivery Sim
shortDesc: Deliver orders through the large city of Peytor Town and save enough money to open a restaurant. Make sure you're ready, as there's a lot of challenges waiting for you!
desc:
Work your way through delivering food, groceries and more using Delivoo and save enough money to open up your restaurant!

The game idea revolves around simulating the role of a local item delivery person. You have a smartphone with an app installed that notifies you of active orders from all around Peytor Town. While you discover the city and earn money walking / running / driving / cycling / commuting / etc your backpack around, you will face a number of challenges.

Keep An Eye On Temperatures

Depending on the type of items you carry in your backpack, you need to carefully arrange them in such way that frozen pizzas don't melt and nachos cheese sauce doesn't get cold. You can upgrade it to carry more items or even have better temperature insulation.

Make Sure You've Got Change

Some customers will prefer to pay cash, so make sure to manage your wallet contents carefully and don't forget to visit the ATM every now and then. If you don't have exact change, you can either bargain and hope for the best or make the customer wait ... your rating will likely suffer.

Grind Your Way Through Delivoo Partner Program

While short and easy orders are smooth, longer distance ones will pay more. Even better: rush hour and weather conditions also influences your payment.
These perks are only available to Delivoo Partners only, so make sure to keep your rating up and customers happy in order to get bronze, silver, gold or even platinum Partner Level.
PS: There's no rating that many can't magically remove

Find your way through Peytor Town

The city is large - so large, in fact, that it has a shore with a beach, a crowded old town, a busy office area, a picturesque mountain road leading to Holywood grade villas and more. Getting around the city can prove to be complicated, depending on the vehicle you pick:
  • Your own two feet
  • Public transportation (You'll need tickets or subscriptions)
  • Bicycle
  • E-Bike (You'll need to charge it or spend twice the effort to pedal it)
  • Electric scooter
  • Car (Gas, maintenance, taxes, parking passes, all that jazz)
  • Electric Car (Pick a good one)!
You can either rent or buy dozens of vehicles of this type and leave them around town so you can easily switch between them to beat the traffic and deliver that hotdog as it's still steaming hot!

name: Aviator: Air Combat
shortDesc: Plunge into the world of sky battles. Pursue an enemy bomber while dodging oncoming missiles. Get your adrenaline pumping and be rewarded with a bonus level.
desc:
Don't let the enemy bomber destroy the city. Do whatever it takes to stop it!

You are an ordinary farmer who enjoys a peaceful life not far from civilization. One morning you see a plane moving over you, heading towards the town. And all's well and good, but it's military and... enemy...
It's time to roll your old single-engine plane out of the barn and remember everything you learned in flight school...

All you have to look forward to:
2 maps...
2 bombers
Several different types of shells
Opportunity to attack the enemy
Dozens of difficulty levels

And it will all be accompanied by an awesome soundtrack!
reviews: 5 user reviewsvery naspaGood gamevery naspaGood gamevery naspaGood game

name: SCAN
shortDesc: PLAYTESTERS WANTED - Join the Discord for more information.
desc:
Early Beta Access

Currently seeking playtesters. Join the Discord server for details.


About the Game

SCAN is a BR-style game with a brand new set of rules. Victory is not achieved through being the last person alive. Instead, the goal is to secure objectives while trying to prevent others from doing the same. Over the course of a match, players are able to collect valuable information by scanning the map, which is temporary and extremely limited. Careful use of this mechanic is essential to winning the game.

SCAN is a work in progress. Most in-game elements will eventually be changed or replaced. However, the game is currently playable and ready to be tested with larger player counts. Participation in the tests is free.

Tests will be scheduled through Discord to ensure that matches are full. The sooner we have enough players, the sooner we can get started..so tell your friends!

A NEW WAY TO PLAY


  • There is no set match length, and no circle. Several players may survive a match, but there can only be one winner.
  • The closer you are to winning a match, the bigger the target on your back will be.
  • There are plenty of opportunities to strategize. Use every tool at your disposal to overpower or outsmart your opponents.

GET DECKED OUT


  • Players have inventory space and 14 slots to equip weapons, armor, and other gear.
  • Equipment and weapon attachments offer stat bonuses to give you the edge in combat.
  • Search the map for equipment - or better yet, take it from the enemy's cold, dead hands.
  • There are hundreds of unique pieces of equipment...with much more to come.

KEEPING IT REAL


  • Weapons, equipment, and environments are grounded in realism. There are no futuristic or fantasy elements to the game.
  • Guns have unique recoil patterns, bullet velocity, bullet drop, and damage. Controlling guns on full-auto can be difficult.

LEAVE YOUR TENT AT HOME


  • A number of rules are in place to keep the action moving.
  • Camping for extended periods of time is not a winning strategy. The game will just go on without you.

name: University Love Affair
shortDesc: University life is always interesting. It is full of romance, dreams and plans for the future. Derek Winters is a university student. Difficulties appeared on his way, having passed which he will be able to find harmony, love and everything he wants. His fate is in your hands. YOU can help him or...
desc:
University Love Affair is a visual novel about Derek Winters, a student that evaluates biology at the university, but he has very difficult tasks on the way to the goal. Fate is accused of being an assistant who will not let Derek ruin his destiny, but can Derek resist and not ruin everything? The novel provides an opportunity to suggest Derek in at least a few ways, but not all of them are described for him. There are several conditional references in the novel, and the expectation depends on you and your decisions. What will you choose?
Lead Derek to success or throw him to the bottom?

• 1 hour of gameplay
• Choice-based story
• 2 romanceable character

name: Skybox
shortDesc: What could be easier than jumping on a skateboard and driving in a straight line to the finish line? It is so? :)
desc:
You play as a stone that has to get to the finish line and a skateboard helps him in this.
You have no control over anything but the turns of the skate wheels. Give in to freedom and enjoy the ride.

You have to go through the same level dozens of times before you reach the goal, but should that scare you?

Game Features:
- 2 Completely different locations
- 10 different levels in each location
- Unusual gaming experience
- Challenging physics to overcome the road
- Dynamic music that will keep you in good shape throughout the journey

name: Crux: The Great Outdoors
shortDesc: Solve grid-based climbing challenges in this unique time-based puzzler. Figure out the right sequence to move your hands and feet and execute it flawlessly - or you will fall!
desc:
Crux: The Great Outdoors is a rock climbing game in which you move your climber’s hands and feet from hold to hold - but each hold will only let you hang on for so long.



Unique time-based puzzle mechanic: Change your body position by moving hands or feet to a new hold - the hand hold determines how much time you have to move before falling off.

Plan ahead and execute: You'll need to think ahead and execute flawlessly to beat all levels in the least amount of moves.

Enjoy the Great Outdoors: Solve over 70 climbing challenges in nine peaceful and beautiful landscapes, from Caribbean coastline to rugged Highlands and red canyon walls.

name: POG X
shortDesc: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.
desc:
POG X — cute, minimal physical puzzle. The player's goal - to keep the star-block on the star-platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

In POG X:

- 50 levels
- Minimalistic art
- Achievements
- Relax music

name: PIP L
shortDesc: PIP L — cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.
desc:
PIP L — cute puzzle game with pipes. Your goal is to connect the pipes together to pass the level.

Rotate the pipes, make a path, but think logically about the connections and try to make a proper flow and solve the puzzle. There is a 50 levels to complete, and the challenge becomes increasingly difficult as you progress. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

In PIP L:

- 50 levels
- Cool art
- Achievements
- Relax music

name: Nightmare Inside
shortDesc: Join Finn on his adventure through the most beautiful periods of his adolescence! Finn, a 16 year old boy, lives in a cute town with his mother and friends. So, what will happen in his life? Put on your coats to find out, because Norway is cold! This game is not suitable for all audiences.
desc:
Hi and welcome. We are Mr. Trees.
Welcome to Finn's life! We've been waiting in this forest for decades, but finally we found someone to tell. Now you're here, you can listen to Finn's story!

Finn, a high school student, lives in a town with his mother and friends.(She makes very nice pies.)
We remember him even as a child. He was a sweetheart! Unfortunately, he didn't see much of his father as a child. But, he has a lot of friends which are adorable. He hangs with them all day. We think their names were Guffie, Fluffy, Axy, Froggie, Foggie, Salsie. If we had to explain them:

Guffie: The purple ghost.
Fluffy: Cutest cat alive.
Axy: The pink axolotl.
Froggie: Frog laughing meme.
Salsie: The shy tomato.
Foggie: Tired from climate change.

Furthermore, we are super excited to see you. Don't miss this adventure! We'll be waiting for you!
reviews:

 The story was intriguing and made me think a lot about my own personal struggles with life and thoughts of suicide. 

I was truly enjoying my time with this game until i got about an hour in and couldn't progress. There was a page with a youtube link that i could not decipher despite trying for a good fifteen minutes or so. Disappointing as i was looking forward to seeing how the game would end. 

Overall 6/10

name: SAIVO
shortDesc: Desmond Holeman has never met his family. His family disappeared in Finland 41 years ago. Now Desmond owns a small hardware store and has become a workaholic. His wife has pressured him to go to Finland to spend peaceful time at his family's old cabin now owned by his great uncle.
desc: SAIVO is a linear story-driven first-person horror experience. Desmond Holeman has never met his family. His family disappeared in Finland 41 years ago. Now Desmond owns a small hardware store and has become a workaholic. His wife has pressured him to go to Finland to spend peaceful time at his family's old cabin now owned by his great uncle.

name: Scrapbox
shortDesc: A stylish fighter with simple inputs and multiple ways to (hopefully) style on your opponent!
desc:
HEY! This game is still a work in progress, and a LOT is being changed. Stick around for more info!

Scrapbox is a frantic 2.5D fighter where a bunch of strange specimen beat each other up for little to no reason.

ACCESSIBILITY FIRST

Scrapbox was made with casual and competitive play in mind as opposed to leaning super heavily in either direction. The game has very easy inputs consisting of a direction, a button press, and your character's position (in air or grounded) instead of super difficult inputs that take 7.346 trillion years to learn. To make up for the game being easy to control, each character has a boat load of attacks - 8 Light Moves, 8 Mid Moves, 8 Strong Moves, 8 Special Moves and 3 Ultra Moves.

SOME TECH, YES

This game has a few ways to cancel moves. There's jump cancelling, which affects everything but Ultras, which is performed by inputting a jump during a small window as you attack. Land cancelling exists too - landing during an aerial cancels it immediately. On top of that, you can air dash in 4 directions, wave dash, dodge roll, and much more!

ACHIEVEMENTS GALORE

There are multiple achievements to snag for doing the most bizarre things possible. Every update brings new ones!

MODES

Just in case regular fighting gets old, there are a handful of other modes for you to enjoy!

  • TRAINING MODE lets you, well, train. You can see every character's hitboxes, speed up or slow the game down and more to let you lab with your favourite character!
  • CAMEO KICKER has you punting tons of flying discs imprinted with characters that didn't quite make the cut. Good old arcade fun!
  • TOUR MODE is the game's platform fighter hybrid, with huge stages and plenty of enemies to smack. Speed through the level or take your time battering each enemy one by one!
  • CHAOS MODE throws balancing out the window and randomises every character's attributes. Good luck, have fun!
  • TAG TEAM MODE lets you choose up to three different fighters and tag them in and out mid-match. If all three get KO'd, you're out!
  • STORY MODE tells the most bizarre story ever seen in a fighting game. 'Nuff said.

name: Polaris Outpost
shortDesc: Polaris Outpost is a survival-horror game with a lone, powerful, intelligent adversary. Stealth and tactics are key aspects of the tense gameplay, which also includes elements of base building and resource management. Explore, capture, survive, escape! Are you up to the challenge?
desc:
You find yourself alone on a remote research outpost in the Polaris system. Something has gone terribly wrong. Much of the base is lacking power and your co-workers are mysteriously missing. There is a deadly threat lurking in this outpost and it will take all of your cunning to keep from becoming another victim.

Your resources are dwindling, so you'll need to secure more food, water, and power, but this involves venturing away from the security of your home base. Equipped with various items to track, deter, and trick your adversary, there is a chance you can outwit your opponent. However, you'll need to keep a close eye on your stats, as it's all too easy to get dehydrated or lose your sanity to the extreme stress of these circumstances.

You will need to explore deep into your opponent's territory to find a way to escape this outpost. A distress signal may take too long, so maybe you can get the escape shuttle up and running instead. Or maybe there is a way to actually defeat this adversary. One thing is for certain, this won't be easy. Your adversary is becoming more intelligent by the minute, and it is adapting to resist your weapons. You'll need to move quickly and find more powerful equipment if you expect to stand a chance. Can you survive Polaris Outpost?



Polaris Outpost is a blend of survival, horror, and minimalist base building. It involves both planning ahead and thinking on your feet in order to survive. You will be up against a single powerful adversary that evolves to become stronger and more intelligent throughout the game. You will secure resource production rooms and find ways to defend or repair them. The gameplay is often tense and frightening as you try to out maneuver and outsmart your deadly opponent in a variety of atmospheric sci-fi environments. The game becomes progressively more open-ended, giving you more of a chance to make your own decisions.

name: Ascent of Ashes
shortDesc: A colony sim set in a post-apocalyptic dystopia. Build and defend your base. Manage your survivors. Engage raiders, aliens, Remnant soldiers and other factions in real-time-with-pause combat. Or use stealth to outwit them. Explore the massive world. Survive at all costs
desc:
Join our Discord!


About the Game

BUILD A NEW HOME

Build your survivors a base where they can rest and trade stories between adventures. Farm crops, tame alien beasts, incorporate salvaged technology and fortify your home against hostile intruders

ENGAGE IN DEEP TACTICAL COMBAT

Prevailing in combat will require more than just point-and-click. A detailed hit simulation and health system will mean that even non-lethal hits can render a survivor unable to go on. Suppressive fire might pin an enemy in place, but the ammunition used up may leave you ill-equipped to fight the next encounter effectively

DRIVE RESTORED VEHICLES

It's a big world out there. To get around you will need better transportation than your legs can provide. One of the things setting Ascent of Ashes apart from other games of this genre is the ability to restore and drive vehicles.


LEAD YOUR SURVIVORS

Each survivor has their own unique personality and motivations. As colony leader it is up to you to find and recruit capable survivors to fill gaps in your roster against ever increasing challenges. Can you keep everyone happy, secure and motivated?


EXPLORE A STRANGE NEW WORLD

You will find yourself in an expansive, procedurally generated world filled with different biomes and points of interest. To survive the post-apocalypse you'll have to brave the pre-collapse ruins and the many dangers that they hold.


CHALLENGE A DYNAMIC AI

It's not enough to just have an in-depth combat system with a variety of mechanics. You also need opponents capable of using those mechanics to challenge you. Enemies will possess varying degrees of intelligence. Taking on a disorganized band of raiders will play very differently from fighting a squad of well-trained Remnant soldiers.


FROM THE ORGINAL CREATORS OF COMBAT EXTENDED

Combining the deep simulation of classic post-apocalyptical survival titles with the tactical challenge of classic real time and turn-based gems, the original creators of RimWorld's heralded Combat Extended mod present a fresh take on the colony sim genre that emphasizes exploration, tight balance and strategic gameplay.

MODDING SUPPORT

Our team has its roots in mod-making and we've been fortunate to have been part of many great modding communities over the years. That's why with Ascent of Ashes, we want to give something back to those communities. We're building the game's engine from the ground up to be easily extendable, and thanks to our extensive experience in creating mods ourselves we know exactly what kind of support mod-makers need. Ascent of Ashes is a game developed by modders, for modders.

name: Above Snakes: Prologue
shortDesc: One fateful night, supernatural events turned people into a living dead forced to roam these wild lands. In the Above Snakes: Prologue, you have awoken in a destroyed settlement and must help survivors rebuild, all while piecing together the secrets and mystery behind the incident.
desc:
Main Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1589120/Above_Snakes/


Community


Mailing List


About the Game



  • An immersive prologue about an apocalyptic event in a fictional version of the Wild West.
  • An isometric world made of tile pieces, created and placed down by the player throughout their journey.
  • Survival systems including crafting, cooking, hunting, fishing, and more.
  • Deep base building with extensive outdoor and indoor assets.
  • A sandbox with a long-term progression system.

About the Prologue

In Above Snakes: Prologue you play the beginning of Above Snakes and get a feel for what the game plays like.

Survival with a Twist

In contrast to other survival games, the world is not generated procedurally. Instead, generate it yourself by placing isometric tile world pieces! Start your journey in the small lumberjack settlement of Hunter's Rest and begin crafting the world around you!

World Pieces

After completing your tasks at Hunter's Rest, explore the world however you see fit! Determine the landscape of this world inspired by the Old West and dictate how it will unfold before you. You have the power to decide what’s next.

Base Building

Invest your resources into your very own cabin and establish a base for defense and shelter.

Craft and Cook

To help the people of Hunter's Rest, you can craft necessary tools from newly discovered resources. Advance in leather working, cloth weaving, and more professions to create the best survival supplies for your adventure!

Follow the Development

name: The Princess of the Tower Wants a Hero
shortDesc: A sweet winter themed Otome Visual Novel about a princess of a tower who just wants a hero. … Except she ends up with a tone-deaf bard for a roommate, a sassy demon for a butler and no hero. Still stuck in a tower though.
desc:
Princess Lumi has been held captive in the demon lord’s castle situated in a land of everlasting winter.
She hates it. It’s cold, it’s lonely, the food is bad, and there’s literally nothing to do! 

The only good thing about this place is the tea and snacks.
Princess:  "I know I said I’d help you out, but I am exhausted. I'd be willing to do something else though."
Hero(?): "Of course! As long as you don’t kick me out of here."
… These are the days of winter they spent together.


-20k+ Words
-1 Romance Route
-1 Good Ending + a couple of bad ends
-5 Unique CGs
-Partial Voice Acting
-Bad Singing
-Bonus POV Side Stories

name: Iron Guard
shortDesc: A bite-sized pixel art tower defense game.
desc:
Iron Guard is a steampunk-fantasy pixel art tower defense game, developed by Griffin G. Salazar with art by the wonderful Gabriela "Brysia" Szmit. Enjoy this bite-sized game from a burgeoning indie developer, who hopes to make many more games in the coming years, each better than the last.

The full game will be released on November 4th. Join the Discord to give feedback and join the game's community: https://discord.gg/NvWjS9FJ6N

name: 1 Rule Sudoku
shortDesc: The last Sudoku game you will need to purchase as it will include a multitude of different board sizes along with puzzle types (i.e. numbers, letters, symbols....)
desc: A one size fits all Sudoku game with unlimited levels. Procedural generated puzzles ranging from sizes 4x4 for the beginners out there, 6x6 for intermediate and 9x9 for the regulars.

name: 7DAYS HEROES
shortDesc: A pixel-art 2D action game in which four characters fight zombies. Manipulate the formation of four people, change the leading character, separate them, and conquer the stage. Collect weapons and items with everyone and aim for the goal. Enjoy the adventure of 33 stages in all 7 areas!
desc:
"7DAYS HEROES"


A pixel-art 2D action game in which four characters fight zombies.

  • Operate a formation of 4 characters
    Capture the stage while changing the leading character and separating. Let's aim for the goal together!
  • Basic 2D gun shooting
    Operate mainly on the main character who handles guns. Challenge stages like 2D platformers and fixed-screen shooters!
  • Different skills and weapons for each character
    Let's clear the stage by making use of the characteristics of each character.
  • The combination of characters changes depending on the stage
    There are also stages where you can challenge the battle with 1 person, 2 or 3 people.
  • Collect nanomachines to power up your weapons
    Nanomachines collected from zombies power up some weapons in three stages.

name: Hentai Island
shortDesc: Travel to a magical island, become more powerful than you could imagine, save the world and let love and lust overtake you along the way.
desc:
Your name is Kreig and you were the prisoner of an evil king who planned to use your gift to absorb the life energy of all people and bring the entire world under his control. Thanks to a girl, you escaped from his clutches and embarked on a journey with her to a magical island. Your goal is to use the gift you've always considered a curse to make yourself powerful enough to save the world.

⚫︎Explore a beautiful and huge open world full of interesting places.
⚫︎Choose your favorite class and fight against powerful monsters with the help of attractive girls, each with her own abilities.
⚫︎Get to know your partners better, get intimate with them and let love and lust invade you. More girls will be added in future updates.
⚫︎RPG Elements: Level up, manage your skill points however you like, and destroy your enemies with your new powers thanks to your skill tree.
⚫︎Get the magical orbs that will increase your power and enjoy incredible abilities that will allow you to move through the world in a totally different and exciting way.

name: Have You Herd?
shortDesc: Round up cantankerous critters and complete challenging levels in action-packed missions with your herdin’ buddies. Use all your dogs’ abilities to get them critters back in their pens. Herd up!
desc: It’s herdin’-fer-hire time with Cowboy Maloy! Control a cute and colorful variety of herdin’ dogs to complete missions and earn that much coveted vacation for all. Watch out for hazards and wild animals which shake up the flow and cause mayhem. Explore varied terrain and missions to unlock fun costumes, earn the best ranking, and find out what happens when the job’s done.

name: Lost in Memory
shortDesc: You play as a girl who has shut herself in her home and refuses to leave. she must explore and find her memories if she ever wants to escape her past. This game is inspired by Yume nikki and various classic RPG Maker horror games.
desc:
You play as a girl who has shut herself in her home and refuses to leave. she must explore and find her memories if she ever wants to escape her past.

1.You will explore various areas and talk to different people to piece together the story.

2.collect your memories and us them to get to new areas and find secrets.

3.collect all your memories to win.

4.you may also find more story with hidden diary entries spread across the game.

This game is inspired by Yume nikki and various classic RPG Maker horror games.

name: I Feel The Need
shortDesc: "You're not going to be happy unless you're going Mach 2 with your hair on fire." Break your limits by taking on the most difficult aerial missions known to man. Ride straight into the danger zone, risk high G-forces to pull off insane maneuvers, and engage in thrilling dogfights.
desc:
"You're not going to be happy unless you're going Mach 2 with your hair on fire." Break your limits by taking on the most difficult aerial missions known to man. Ride straight into the danger zone, risk high G-forces to pull off insane maneuvers, and engage in thrilling dogfights.

I Feel the Need is a fan homage to the Top Gun films.

Key Features

  • For fans of Top Gun and Top Gun: Maverick
  • Engaging and exciting dogfights
  • Challenging missions for the most skilled pilots
  • Created by a solo developer

name: Alchemia Story
shortDesc: Create the character you really want, and explore the alchemy world with the help of "YOME"!
desc:
Alchemia Story is a modern online MMORPG with traditional Japanese-style RPG elements.
You can enjoy many adventures in an alchemy world with the support of your partner character "YOME"!

◆Design your character freely!◆
Create the character you really want!
Adjust your character's hairstyle, height, body structure, eyebrow length, eye color and more!

◆You are not alone, explore with YOME◆
Explore with the help of "YOME"!
YOME will quide you to your destination, support you in battles and help with synthesizing items!
Customize your YOME like your character, and create your ideal partner!

◆Solo-Player Mode◆
Use the Solo Player Mode feature to play by yourself!
If you feel you wouldn't fit in with MMORPG community, it's okay!
Use this mode to play more casually by yourself!

◆Easy communication with Like and Stickers!◆
Send a "Like" for those players who you want to be friends with!
Also, "Sticker" function will make communication faster and easier!
Let's make many friends!

◆Battle hard with easy commands!◆
Simply choose your commands to fight!
Cooperate with your "YOME" and defeat the enemies!
Challenge the strong enemies with your friends! Maximum of 8 players can join the battle!

◆Unforgettable story and characters!◆
You will be able to join in this fantastic world with unique characters!
Enjoy the fascinating RPG story!

◆Ride your Mount and start new adventures!！◆
Get on a Mamono, explore the world and grow stronger together!
The Mounts are not just monsters, but also carpets and macarons...!?

★This game is for you if...★

・You like MMORPG
・You often play MMORPG games
・You like customizing your character
・You enjoy games where you have various Avatars

◆Story◆
"A world where magic meets alchemy.

It's the eve of the Industrial Revolution.
The brave people of the cities are about to leave on an adventure to defeat monsters...

Join this journey to conquer the demon kings around the world!"

name: Limits of Sky
shortDesc: Limits of Sky is a comedy/drama adult video game in which a young girl - in the face of her own mortality - tries to live out her life to the fullest.
desc:
JOIN US ON


About the Game

Unlike most people, Sky’s life was marked by tragedy at a young age. Suddenly forced to spend her waking hours overwhelmed with study and work, her days became a grey blur. After several years of painstaking efforts, Sky had finally finished college. Wanting to celebrate this joyous occasion, Margot - Sky's best friend - barely manages to drag Sky out of her hidey-hole and into a world of frivolous fun. Though, tragedy isn’t the same as lightning and it likes to strike the same person twice.


Accompany Sky and experience the struggles and difficulties she'll have to face and overcome; the lessons she will have to learn, the things she'll have to risk and sacrifice on a journey towards the end. Witness just how bright a dying candle can shine.









Game Content:
- 10.000+ IMAGES
- 1.000+ ANIMATIONS

Gameplay:
- Dialogue choices
- Branching Story
- Free roam
- Time Cycle
- In-game Hint system
- Define the relationships within the game
- Change angle
- Lust time
- And much more


WARNING!
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content, drug abuse and controversial sexual content (incest) that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

name: Señorita El Chupacabra
shortDesc: A Third person shooter in the crazy version of Wild West where steampunk meets magic, also, human races are living next to fantasy creatures where Maria El Chupacabra, a young vampire decided to become a bounty hunter and she has some magic tricks and unique weapons like... ...rolling pin.
desc:
Funny West
A Third person shooter in the crazy version of Wild West where steampunk meets magic, also, human races are living next to fantasy creatures.

So Players not only use steampunk-style weapons but also the magic that can enchant inventory, attack the enemy or curse them.

Each race has its advantages and disadvantages and sometimes they have unique inventory so be prepared to meet for example tough ogres, dwarves with high-tech weapons and Indians with their ancestor magic.

Maria El Chupacabra
The main protagonist in this story, a young vampire lady decided to take other life paths than being a regular housekeeper, so she decided to become a bounty hunter.
So she leads her first steps to Devil's Canyon where locals sometimes have a hot temperament.
Maybe she is weak as a young lady, but keep in mind that she is a vampire and she has some magic tricks like hypnotizing enemies to gain control of them and unique weapons like...

...rolling pin.

Gameplay
The gameplay refers to the games of the past where finding stuff is more usable like finding ammo for Maria's Superweapon.
Depending on the game development, for now, will be the closed location from point A to point B, but the latter maybe will be a chance for a small open world.

name: Bebop
shortDesc: Bebop is a private investigator that gets himself mixed with... THE MOB. And he regrets his actions, then comes back home a hero, after having tried to kill an innocent man and having tried to end him in a hospital.
desc:
Set in a distant future, a dystopian society struggles with crime and prostitution. In a dark alley, a sign on the door reads: "Bebop, private investigator". But is he a private investigator really? I DON'T THINK SO. Bebop is involved with the mob, and he is about to embark on a journey without return. I mean, he will return home, but NOT THE SAME as before. Bebop will meet people that will shape his personality, he will go after those who wronged him, and he will, in the end, reach the end of his story. OR IS HE?

This amazing adventure was written by Luis Felipe Pimenta, in his first attempt at creating a game. Hopefully, it won't be his last. His team is made of programmers doing artwork and artists doing programming.

Bebop is a platform side-scroller pixel art adventure. Use physics to solve puzzles, travel through different places in Cybercity to complete your quests.

Features:

- 2D Physics puzzles
- Choices that matter and affect your ending
- Tough ethical decisions to make
- Tightly crafted platforming action and deeply emotional storytelling
- Exploring options: to find hidden levels, equipment and more storytelling
- Use drugs to jump higher
- Well-designed maps: with traps and cyberpunk ambiences
- Challenging bosses

name: Raiders of Ruin
shortDesc: Raiders of Ruin takes the thrill of battling a mighty MMO raid boss and distils it down into a single-player experience. Study your enemies, assemble your party, and execute your strategy as you face off against dozens of challenging foes in this turn-based fantasy RPG.
desc:
In Raiders of Ruin, you guide a group of 5 champions sent on a quest to seize the throne of the Underworld itself. Along the way, you will encounter many deadly bosses and engage in challenging, strategic turn-based combat. You decide how to build your party, mixing-and-matching between 9 different classes, each with drastically different strengths and weaknesses. You can change classes any time, so experiment frequently to craft the perfect strategy for each enemy!

Features

  • Over 40 boss fights, each with their own unique mechanics. Expect multiple phases, colourful gimmicks, and ruthless attacks.
  • No game-overs: Your progress is saved after every battle. Defeat simply means a chance to try again.
  • Study your enemies ahead of time by viewing the Boss Log, where you can find a record of your greatest foes and a description of their attacks. You must prepare to counter their strategies with a plan of your own!
  • Class-based combat system that's simple to learn, hard to master. Swap classes before any battle to arm yourself for the fight ahead. Find a combo that works for you and stick to it, or experiment frequently to find the perfect squad.
  • 9 main classes to choose from. Need more firepower? Swap that Paladin for a Wizard. Expecting a long fight? Try poisoning your foe with a Rogue.
  • Multiple subclasses for most classes, providing even more customization. Should your Ranger be a Hunter, or a Survivalist?
  • Innovative rematch system that replaces traditional level-grinding. Instead of fighting normal enemies repeatedly, you will occasionally be given the opportunity to rematch a boss of your choosing for a second chance at its rewards (though this system is entirely optional).
  • MIDI soundtrack inspired by PC games of the early 2000's, with some modern twists.
  • A backpack that might be alive?

-------------------------------------------------

"I won't waste my time trying to plead with you. We all know how this has to end.
So...

Are you ready for battle?"
